tag.description: SmartCam allows to apply computer vision detection algorithms to camera stream.

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: Name of the client side widget.
attribute.name: widgetVar

attribute.description: Style of the camera container.
attribute.name: style

attribute.description: Style class of the camera container.
attribute.name: styleClass

attribute.description: Width of the camera viewport.
attribute.name: width

attribute.description: Height of the camera viewport.
attribute.name: height

attribute.description: Starts camera during initialization
attribute.name: autoStart

attribute.description: video update timeout in milliseconds.
attribute.name: renderTimeout

attribute.description: callback called when detections are caught
attribute.name: renderTimeout

attribute.description: constructor function for customize the model used to make predictions. By default SmartCam uses tensorflow facemesh model.
attribute.name: model

attribute.description: function called to make predictions. By default SmartCam uses tensorflow facemesh 'estimateFaces()' prediction
attribute.name: predict

tag.description: SpeechRecognition is a client-side component to perform natural speech recognition.

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: Name of the client side widget.
attribute.name: widgetVar

attribute.description: Language. Default is 'en-US'
attribute.name: language

attribute.description: Javascript called to handle a speech
attribute.name: speechHandler

attribute.description: Javascript called to handle an error on obtaining the speech
attribute.name: speechErrorHandler

tag.description: Speaker is a client-side component to perform text-to-speech.

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: Name of the client side widget.
attribute.name: widgetVar

attribute.description: Language. Default is 'en-US'
attribute.name: language
